attributes.action: Put a law in place that provides people with better mental health support
attributes.additional_details: Over the past 20 months we have seen to many reality tv stars feel that not being here anymore is the only way out. This is not good enough in my opinion. Just because people are on tv that isn’t necessarily the life they portray
attributes.background: Recently to many people from love island are coming out of the show and criticising the mental health support the show offers they were critiqued by Dom lever who apppeared night series 3 of the show and claimed you only get support after if you are number 1

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are concerned about reality tv stars, but we're not sure what you'd like the UK Government of Parliament to do. It seems like you are concerned with the supported offered by the TV companies themselves.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
